title: Relates to the eligibility of small employers and individuals for participation in the program for standardized health insurance contracts
summary: Relates to the eligibility of small employers and individuals for participation in the program for standardized health insurance contracts; increases the income eligibility for households in certain counties.

   13  equivalent of such net income];

   18    (i) WITH not more than fifty eligible employees;

   20  expense reimbursed or prepaid basis covering employees in effect  during
